name: Meltdown (itch) (dylaan)
description:
The frantic game about making sure a nuclear reactor doesn't go... nuclear. 

HOW TO PLAY:

  • Read the in-game Tutorial
  • To complete the Western room, type the letters R, E, S, E, and T on your keyboard.
  • To complete the Southern room, read the screen and step on the right button.
  • To complete the Eastern room, step on the correct buttons in the right order.
  • Completing rooms earns you score.
  • If a room breaks down when its light is on red, the room will be closed permanently, you'll gain less score when completing rooms, and the time between failures will speed up.
